channel.title: Need help with a portal
channel.description: I need help with a portal..I don't get how to add them so I was wondering if you people can hep me? please :D anyway what I don't get is the case # ok for example.. I've asked somebody and they told me "The case number is usually the portal id." or something like that.. but I want to use a zamorak portal (4388) for my staff hangout.. and I've searched [code]case 4388:[/code] and it appears its already being used.. and the other thing I don't get is how would I make it appear? [code]AddGlobalObject(3014, 3358, 4388, 0, 10);//Staff portal[/code] is that right? or I can't use addglobalobject or I would really appreciate it if someone can make up a code for me because this stuff really confuses me. Thanks ;D --Mupescape

item.title: Need help with a portal
item.dc:creator: @ryanandmatt ryanandmatt
item.description:
@ryanandmatt wrote:

ok first search for in client

public void NewObjects
then at the end of list add
makeGlobalObject(x, y, ID, #, #);//NAMEOFITEM
x=x cooridinate y=y coordinate ID=item id #= the numbers that u want there NAMEOFITEM=name of item [b]in that case you would put in[/b]
makeGlobalObject(3014, 3358, 4388, 0, 10);//Staff portal
i hope that helps

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with a portal
item.dc:creator: @Mupescape Mupescape
item.description:
@Mupescape wrote:

I need help with a portal…I don’t get how to add them so I was wondering if you people can hep me? please
anyway what I don’t get is the case #
ok for example…
I’ve asked somebody and they told me “The case number is usually the portal id.” or something like that…
but I want to use a zamorak portal (4388) for my staff hangout… and I’ve searched

case 4388:

and it appears its already being used…
and the other thing I don’t get is how would I make it appear?

AddGlobalObject(3014, 3358, 4388, 0, 10);//Staff portal

is that right? or I can’t use addglobalobject or I would really appreciate it if someone can make up a code for me because this stuff really confuses me. Thanks ;D
–Mupescape

Read full topic
